text:
Location:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.0/programs/configure.html

--disable-env
    Enable setting and clearing of environment variables, which is provided by
mod_env.

SHOULD BE:

--disable-env
    Disable setting and clearing of environment variables, which is provided by
mod_env.


--disable-status
    Enable the process/thread monitoring, which is provided by mod_status.

SHOULD BE:

--disable-status
    Disable the process/thread monitoring, which is provided by mod_status.
creator: rambousek@sorudan.sk
